title: Reconciliation
verses: 2 Corinthians 5:18–19 (WEB) — “God… reconciled us to himself… and gave us the ministry of reconciliation.”
Colossians 1:19–20 (WEB) — “Making peace through the blood of his cross.”
Ephesians 2:14–16 (WEB) — “He is our peace… reconciling them both to God.”
Romans 12:18 (WEB) — “As much as it is up to you, be at peace with all.”
body: Jesus makes peace by His cross; we extend that peace. Seek understanding, own your part, forgive, and work toward just, wise repair.
prayer: Prince of Peace, reconcile hearts and heal divides. Use me as an instrument of Your peace in word and deed. Amen.
